posts.title: third-blog-page.md
posts.text: SPAM is the first letter of these four words：Speaker Purpose Audience Medium， 1.schematic knowledge it is about the topic that has been talking about. 2.context it is about where and where we talk and who we are talking to, and it provides the visual information we can use in the physical contact. 3.language means the pronunciation, the grammar of the talk and the first thing to learn a new language. What strategies can the speaker use?answer:1、less complex；2、common vocabulary；3、say clearly and slowly；4、stress and repeat important words；5、add some facial expressions。6、use gestures; use different mediumchecking that what i understand is what the speaker meant.clarification request to checked the both parties who are happy with what’s been understood. how to learn english in college . reading discussion grammarprepare for a testreading for reason.get opinion by argument.what you need to read? summarize,

posts.title: second-blog-page.md
posts.text: hexo博客搭建npm install -g cnpm –registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org # 从淘宝下载中国的包管理器，这样速度更快cnpm install -g hexo-cli hexo s # 启动博客hexo n # 写篇文章 hexo cleanhexo g # 生成hexo d # 部署cnpm install –save hexo-deployer-git # 将博客部署到GitHub

posts.title: first bolg page
posts.text: first pagecontent second page 参考文献www.rabiesdadada.xyz

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
